Class PostProcessUtil

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Common operations for post processing.

    • Method Detail

      • cloneInterMineObject

        public static <O extends InterMineObject> O cloneInterMineObject(O obj)
                                                      throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Create a clone of given InterMineObject including the id. This is designed for altering and storing again (to avoid cache problems) so doesn't copy collections.
        Type Parameters:
        O - The object type
        Parameters:
        obj - object to clone
        Returns:
        the cloned object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if problems with reflection

      • copyInterMineObject

        public static <O extends InterMineObject> O copyInterMineObject(O obj)
                                                     throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Create a copy of given InterMineObject with *no* id set and copies of collections
        Type Parameters:
        O - The object type
        Parameters:
        obj - object to copy
        Returns:
        the copied object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if problems with reflection

      • isInstance

        public static boolean isInstance(org.intermine.metadata.Model model,
                 InterMineObject obj,
                 java.lang.String clsName)
        Convenience method to test whether an InterMineObject is an instance of the given class name without needing to import the class itself. This is used to refer to classes that may not be present in particular data models.
        Parameters:
        model - the data model
        obj - an object to test
        clsName - test whether obj is an instance of this class
        Returns:
        true if obj is an instance of clsName

      • checkFieldExists

        public static void checkFieldExists(org.intermine.metadata.Model model,
                    java.lang.String className,
                    java.lang.String fieldName,
                    java.lang.String message)
                             throws org.intermine.metadata.MetaDataException
        Check that a class exists and has a field of the given name. If the either the class or field aren't in the model this will write a warning to the log preceded by the give message and throw a MetaDataException. If fieldName is null or an empty string just the class will be tested.
        Parameters:
        model - the data model
        className - the class to check in the model
        fieldName - check that className has a field with this name, can be null or empty string
        message - some text to precede the logged warning.
        Throws:
        org.intermine.metadata.MetaDataException - if the the class or field name don't exist

      • findConnectingClasses

        public static java.util.Iterator<ResultsRow<InterMineObject>> findConnectingClasses(ObjectStore os,
                                                                    java.lang.Class<? extends org.intermine.model.FastPathObject> sourceClass,
                                                                    java.lang.String sourceClassFieldName,
                                                                    java.lang.Class<? extends org.intermine.model.FastPathObject> connectingClass,
                                                                    java.lang.String connectingClassFieldName,
                                                                    java.lang.Class<? extends org.intermine.model.FastPathObject> destinationClass,
                                                                    boolean orderBySource)
                                                                             throws ObjectStoreException,
                                                                                    java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Return an iterator over the results of a query that connects two classes by a third using arbitrary fields. eg. To find Genes, Exon pairs where "gene.transcripts CONTAINS transcript AND transcript.exons CONTAINS exon" pass Gene.class, "transcripts", Transcript.class, "exons", Exon.class
        Parameters:
        os - an ObjectStore to query
        sourceClass - the first class in the query
        sourceClassFieldName - the field in the sourceClass which should contain the connectingClass
        connectingClass - the class referred to by sourceClass.sourceFieldName
        connectingClassFieldName - the field in connectingClass which should contain destinationClass
        destinationClass - the class referred to by connectingClass.connectingClassFieldName
        orderBySource - if true query will be ordered by sourceClass
        Returns:
        an iterator over the results - (Gene, Exon) pairs
        Throws:
        ObjectStoreException - if problem reading ObjectStore
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if one of the field names doesn't exist in the corresponding class.
